title: spinner
---

# fl-spinner

This is a spinner that can be used as a loading indicator.

## Examples

<fl-spinner size='medium'></fl-spinner>

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description  | Type                             | Default    |
| -------- | --------- | ------------ | -------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `size`   | `size`    | Spinner size | `"small" \| "medium" \| "large"` | `"medium"` |
